    Level1FlyingBoard - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.model.board
    The Level1FlyingBoard class extends FlyingBoard to represent a basic flying board used in the first level of the gameModel.
    Level1FlyingBoard() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.model.board.Level1FlyingBoard
    Constructs a new Level1FlyingBoard with: A run length of 18 units (passed to the superclass constructor). A fixed list of credits awarded based on player ranking: 4, 3, 2, 1.
    Level1ShipBoard - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.model.board
    Represents a Level 1 ship board in the game.

    Level2FlyingBoard - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.model.board
    The Level2FlyingBoard class extends FlyingBoard to represent a specialized flying board with an additional hourglass mechanic.
    Level2FlyingBoard() - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.model.board.Level2FlyingBoard
    Constructs a new Level2FlyingBoard with: A run length of 34 units (passed to the superclass constructor). The hourglass positioned at the start (position 0). A fixed list of credits awarded based on player ranking: 12, 9, 6, 3.
    Level2ShipBoard - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.model.board
    Represents a Level 2 ship board in the game.
    Level2ShipBoard(PlayerColor, GameClientNotifier, boolean) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.is25am33.model.board.Level2ShipBoard
    Constructs a new Level 2 ship board.
